mapper.select: SELECT num, phrs_id, phrs_text, author FROM (SELECT row_number() over(order by a.phrs_id) num, a.phrs_id, a.phrs_text, a.author FROM ttb_pharse a ) WHERE num = #{randomNum}
SELECT num, phrs_id, phrs_text, author FROM (SELECT row_number() over(order by a.phrs_id) num, a.phrs_id, a.phrs_text, a.author FROM ttb_pharse a ) WHERE phrs_id = #{phrId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ttb_diary ( diary_id, img_id, emc_id, phrs_id, mv_id, mv_drt, author, tags, content, opened, comm_cnt, rcmd_cnt, view_cnt, stm_anl_pst, stm_anl_ntr, stm_anl_ngt, regdate ) VALUES ( #{diaryId}, 0, #{emcId}, #{phrsId}, #{mvId}, #{mvDrt}, #{author}, #{tags}, #{content}, 0, 0, 0, 0, #{stmAnlsPst}, #{stmAnlsNtr}, #{stmAnlsNgt}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT d.diary_id, d.img_id, d.emc_id, e.emc_data, e.emc_text, d.phrs_id, d.mv_id, d.mv_drt, d.author, d.tags, d.content, d.comm_cnt, d.rcmd_cnt, d.view_cnt, d.stm_anl_pst, d.stm_anl_ntr, d.stm_anl_ngt, d.regdate, d.moddate FROM ttb_diary d, TTB_EMOTICON e, (SELECT max(diary_id) as lastDiaryId FROM ttb_diary WHERE author = #{author} ) b WHERE d.emc_id = e.emc_id and d.diary_id = b.lastDiaryId

SELECT d.diary_id, d.img_id, d.emc_id, e.emc_data, e.emc_text, d.phrs_id, d.mv_id, d.mv_drt, d.author, d.tags, d.content, d.comm_cnt, d.rcmd_cnt, d.view_cnt, d.stm_anl_pst as stmAnlsPst, d.stm_anl_ntr as stmAnlsNtr, d.stm_anl_ngt as stmAnlsNgt, d.regdate, d.moddate FROM ttb_diary d, TTB_EMOTICON e WHERE d.emc_id = e.emc_id and d.diary_id = #{diaryId}

SELECT diary_id, img_id, emc_id, phrs_id, mv_id, mv_drt, author, tags, content, comm_cnt, rcmd_cnt, view_cnt, stm_anl_pst, stm_anl_ntr, stm_anl_ngt, regdate, moddate FROM ttb_diary WHERE author = #{author} ORDER by regdate desc
SELECT nvl(count(diary_id),0) FROM ttb_diary WHERE author = #{author} ORDER by regdate desc

SELECT num, diary_id, img_id, emc_id, phrs_id, mv_id, mv_drt, author, tags, content, opened, comm_cnt, rcmd_cnt, view_cnt, stm_anl_pst, stm_anl_ntr, stm_anl_ngt, regdate, moddate FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.diary_id desc ) num, a.* FROM ttb_diary a Where a.opened = 1 )
WHERE num between #{startrow} and #{endrow} ORDER by regdate desc

SELECT num, diary_id, img_id, emc_id, phrs_id, mv_id, mv_drt, author, tags, content, opened, comm_cnt, rcmd_cnt, view_cnt, stm_anl_pst, stm_anl_ntr, stm_anl_ngt, regdate, moddate FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.diary_id desc ) num, a.* FROM ttb_diary a WHERE a.author = #{author} )
WHERE num between #{startrow} and #{endrow} ORDER by regdate desc
